Description of incident: Aecom has notified current and prior employees of a data breach that exposed employee personnel files. Hackers were able to penetrate their corporate network, which included the employee payroll system for the US specifically.The information exposed inlcuded names, addresses, Social Security numbers, personal bank account numbers and routing numbers.The company has set up 12 months of All ClearID at no cost. For those affected they can call which can be reached at 1-877-615-3770.
